translated: Welcome indeed it was to me
The one of great radiance, the teacher of the multitude,

analyzed: agga pattam vināyaka  sa devakassa lokassa
translated: the foremost of the foremost, the leader,🔽the Victor, of incomparable vision,
for the world with its gods.

analyzed: mahā nāgam mahāvīra  mahā juti manāsava
translated: The great nāga, the great hero,🔽the one of great splendor, the one without taints,
the one who has completely destroyed all taints,
the teacher, the one who is not afraid in any way.
For a long time, indeed, I was defiled,
bound by the fetters of views;
But the Blessed One liberated me,
